translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……政治家の思考、ちゅうことでっか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So it's the way politicians think, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　えぇ。誰もが何かしらの得になるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Yeah. Politics is about making sure everyone gains something somehow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計らうのが政治ですからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because that's what politics is all about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あんた、間に入って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You, getting in the middle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっつり金もろてるやろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are definitely taking a good chunk of money, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははは、浅はかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, how shallow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しい業者のサポート要員を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just having support personnel for the new contractors

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジオの者で固めた程度で…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: largely made up of people from Geo... that's all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんッ！　えふんおほん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm! Ahem, uh-huh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まあええわ。で、今何してんのん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, whatever. So, what are you doing now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え。いえ、私も総統殿の元にいて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, well, I too have been with the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 短くない時間を前線で過ごしましたからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: spending quite some time on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間の体験記でも書こうと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I was thinking of writing a record of my experiences..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全に儲ける気やんけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're totally planning to make money off this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　聞いたぞ貴様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! I heard that, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 伝記を書くらしいな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're writing a biography, huh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひいっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当然俺様の活躍を書きまくるんだろうな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course you'll write extensively about my exploits, right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、当たり前でございますよ！　は、ははは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-Of course I will! Ha, haha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、それ本にして儲けるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, let's turn that into a book and make some money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一割は取り分にくれてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give you a ten percent cut."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「九割どこにいくんすか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where's the other ninety percent going!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世の中、こうやって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's how balance is maintained in the world...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バランス取られてるんやなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is how things are balanced..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、私も戦争に行けっていうの？　いいわ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, you're telling me to go to war too? Fine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暴力を振るうだけが戦争じゃないし、私も色々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Violence isn't the only way to wage war, and I have lots

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の人たちには言いたい事あるの。それで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to say to the demon army people. So..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃあーーーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaaaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおっ……なんだ？　女の悲鳴か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... what's that? A woman's scream?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黄色い悲鳴、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A high-pitched scream, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どなたか有名な方が来てらっしゃるんでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe some famous person has arrived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう奴が事欠かんからな、この城も。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This castle never lacks people like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが真の人気者であるこの総統閣下には敵うまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no one can rival our beloved Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　どこのどいつだか知らんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! Whoever that is, I don't know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その人気、俺様が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that popularity belongs to me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら総統さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっ！　おばはん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Bwah! An old hag!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、並んでくださーい、並んでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, please line up, please line up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後尾、こっちっすよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The end of the line is this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい。なにやっとんじゃ、ここで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey. What are you doing here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ご主人様。臨時サイン会の待機列の整理を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Master. We're organizing the waiting line for the impromptu autograph session."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サイン会……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Autograph session...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、おばはんの…………？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You mean that old lady's...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パトリシア・ベーコンでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Patricia Bacon, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 閣下、知らないんすか？　アイスの人でしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sir, you don't know? She's the ice lady."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知ってると思うか？　あんなおばはん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think I know? An old hag like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそやかましいくらいしか印象がない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only impression I have is that she's annoyingly loud."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっははは。閣下らしいっすねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahahaha. That sounds just like you, sir."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is how things are balanced..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黄色い悲鳴、ですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A high-pitched scream, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どなたか有名な方が来てらっしゃるんでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe some famous person has arrived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう奴が事欠かんからな、この城も。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This castle never lacks people like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが真の人気者であるこの総統閣下には敵うまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no one can rival our beloved Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　どこのどいつだか知らんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! Whoever that is, I don't know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その人気、俺様が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that popularity belongs to me...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら総統さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっ！　おばはん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Bwah! An old hag!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、並んでくださーい、並んでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, please line up, please line up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後尾、こっちっすよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The end of the line is this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい。なにやっとんじゃ、ここで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey. What are you doing here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ご主人様。臨時サイン会の待機列の整理を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Master. We're organizing the waiting line for the impromptu autograph session."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サイン会……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Autograph session...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、おばはんの…………？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You mean that old lady's...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パトリシア・ベーコンでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Patricia Bacon, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 閣下、知らないんすか？　アイスの人でしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sir, you don't know? She's the ice lady."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知ってると思うか？　あんなおばはん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think I know? An old hag like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそやかましいくらいしか印象がない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only impression I have is that she's annoyingly loud."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっははは。閣下らしいっすねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahahaha. That sounds just like you, sir."
